0.title: THE IDES OF MARCH
clues: March 15, 1493:This explorer returns to Spain when the Nina docks at Palos

8.title: EVERYTHING YOU ALWAYS WANTED TO KNOW ABOUT SEX
clues: A fertilized egg embeds itself in the wall of this organ, also called the womb

Also called reduction division, this type of nuclear division underlies all sexual reproduction
